mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Q(q_no, mem_no, sub_ca_no, book_ca_no, q_title, q_content, q_sos, q_up, q_rpt_cnt, q_admin_state) VALUES (Q_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{mem_no}, #{sub_ca_no}, #{book_ca_no}, #{q_title}, #{q_content}, 0, 0, 0, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT rownum,C.CA_NAME,SC.SUB_CA_NAME,BC.BOOK_CA_NAME,M.MEM_NICK,G.GRADE_NAME,Q1.*, R.* FROM (SELECT * FROM Q) Q1, (SELECT * FROM MEM) M, (SELECT * FROM SUB_CA) SC, (SELECT * FROM CA) C, (SELECT * FROM BOOK_CA) BC, (SELECT * FROM GRADE) G, (SELECT * FROM REPLY) R WHERE Q1.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO AND Q1.SUB_CA_NO = SC.SUB_CA_NO AND SC.CA_NO = C.CA_NO AND Q1.BOOK_CA_NO = BC.BOOK_CA_NO AND G.GRADE_NO = M.GRADE_NO AND Q1.Q_NO = R.Q_NO AND R.REPLY_PICK = 1 AND Q1.SUB_CA_NO = #{param1} ORDER BY Q1.Q_DATE DESC

SELECT QRSC.Q_NO, QRSC.MEM_NO, QRSC.Q_SOS, QRSC.SUB_CA_NO, QRSC.Q_TITLE, QRSC.BOOK_CA_NO, BK.BOOK_CA_NAME, QRSC.Q_UP, QRSC.Q_DATE FROM (SELECT QR.Q_NO, QR.Q_SOS,QR.MEM_NO, QR.SUB_CA_NO, QR.Q_TITLE, QR.BOOK_CA_NO, QR.Q_UP, QR.Q_DATE FROM (SELECT Q.Q_NO, Q.Q_SOS, Q.MEM_NO, Q.SUB_CA_NO, Q.Q_TITLE, Q.BOOK_CA_NO, Q.Q_UP, Q.Q_DATE FROM Q LEFT OUTER JOIN REPLY R ON Q.Q_NO = R.Q_NO WHERE R.Q_NO IS NULL OR R.REPLY_PICK = 0) QR LEFT OUTER JOIN SUB_CA SC ON QR.SUB_CA_NO = SC.SUB_CA_NO WHERE QR.SUB_CA_NO = #{param1}) QRSC LEFT OUTER JOIN BOOK_CA BK ON QRSC.BOOK_CA_NO = BK.BOOK_CA_NO GROUP BY QRSC.Q_NO, QRSC.MEM_NO, QRSC.Q_SOS, QRSC.SUB_CA_NO, QRSC.Q_TITLE, QRSC.BOOK_CA_NO, BK.BOOK_CA_NAME, QRSC.Q_UP, QRSC.Q_DATE ORDER BY QRSC.Q_DATE DESC
SELECT * FROM Q, BOOK_CA BC, SUB_CA SC WHERE Q.BOOK_CA_NO = BC.BOOK_CA_NO AND Q.SUB_CA_NO = SC.SUB_CA_NO AND Q.SUB_CA_NO = #{param1} ORDER BY Q.Q_DATE DESC
